amendment.description: Amendment decreases and then increases funding for Office of the Inspector General by $1 for the purpose of reviewing the practices related to collection and content of bids for certain veterans' hospital construction projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease and then increase funding for Office of the Inspector General by $1 for the purpose of reviewing the practices related to collection and content of bids for certain veterans' hospital construction projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Terry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
